title: Warren Gatland: Please continue to write Wales off - we love nothing more
text:
Warren Gatland says he is delighted that Wales have been cast as underdogs for their World Cup semi-final clash against South Africa on Sunday, using his final press conference before arguably the biggest match in the country’s history to encourage any doubters to “continue to write us off” as that will only make his men stronger.

While the build-up to tomorrow’s second World Cup semi-final in Yokohama has lacked the pyrotechnics of Saturday's first, with Gatland and opposite number Rassie Erasmus playing far nicer than England’s Eddie Jones and New Zealand’s Steve Hansen, the tension...
description: Warren Gatland says he is delighted that Wales have been cast as underdogs for their World Cup semi-final clash against South Africa on Sunday, using his final press conference before arguably the biggest match in the country’s history to encourage any doubters to “continue to write us off” as that will only make his men stronger.
